pages.text: But they denied him, so they certainly be presented (for punishment)
except the servants, exclusively of Allah
And We left on him, (the responsibility of conveying Our message) among others
Peace on Ilyaasiin
Thus do We reward the doers of good
He was certainly among Our believing servants
And Lut was certainly from among Our messengers
when We saved him and his followers all together
except an old woman (who was) among those who remained behind
then We destroyed the others
And you certainly pass by their (ruins) during the day
and during the night. Do you not then understand
And Yunus was certainly from among Our messengers
when he fled to the loaded ship
then drew lots but was among those who were slipped off (from the ship)
then the fish swallowed him and he was blameworthy
And had he not been among those who glorify (Allah)
he would have remained in its stomach till the day they are raised
Then We cast him on the naked shore while he was sick
and We caused a tree of gourd to grow over him
And We sent him to more than a hundred thousand (people)
so they believed, therefore We made them enjoy till a time
Then ask them, “Are there daughters for your Fosterer and for them sons
Or did We create the angels females while they were witnesses?”
Is it not from their own devised falsehood that they say (that)
Allah has a son? And they are certainly liars
Has He chosen daughters (in preference to) sons
